text:
Explosive Amendment Regulations 2017

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Explosives Act 2012 .

18 July 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Building and Construction

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Explosive Amendment Regulations 2017 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which the Marine and Safety (Pilotage and Navigation) Regulations 2017 commence.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Explosives Regulations 2012 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Explosives Regulations 2012 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 July 2017
